[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Function: unix_timestamp_sec()] [Integer Overflow] Can duration_since_epoch().as_secs() overflow when cast to i64 on systems where time has progressed beyond i64::MAX seconds (year 2038 problem on 32-bit)? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Function: unix_timestamp_sec()] [Panic on Clock Skew] Does duration_since_epoch() panic if system clock is set before Unix epoch, causing restore operations to fail on misconfigured systems? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Function: unix_timestamp_sec()] [Timestamp Manipulation] Can an attacker manipulate system clock to affect backup timestamps, causing old backups to appear recent and bypassing freshness checks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Integration] [Resource Limit Conflict] If RocksdbOpt sets very high limits but concurrent_downloads is also high, can total resource usage exceed system limits causing OOM kills mid-restore? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Integration] [Chunk Size Mismatch] If max_chunk_size in GlobalBackupOpt doesn't match expected chunk sizes in restore operations, can this cause parsing errors and data corruption? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Integration] [Progress Tracking Race] Can get_progress() returning None while restore is actually in progress cause coordinator to restart from beginning, duplicating state writes and corrupting DB? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Integration] [DB Lock Contention] If multiple restore processes try to open the same db_dir with read_only=false, does RocksDB locking prevent corruption or can both proceed simultaneously? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Memory Safety] [Arc Clone Safety] Are Arc<RestoreRunMode> and Arc<HashMap> clones safe across thread boundaries, or can interior mutability patterns violate Rust's safety guarantees? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Memory Safety] [MockStore Lifetime] Does MockStore's lifetime properly outlive all StateSnapshotRestore instances using it, or can use-after-free occur in async contexts? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Memory Safety] [Reference Invalidation] When RestoreHandler is wrapped in Arc, can the underlying AptosDB be closed while RestoreHandler is still in use, causing dangling references? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Async Safety] [path_exists Race] Between metadata() call and actual file operations, can files be deleted/created causing TOCTOU vulnerabilities in async restore code? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/mod.rs] [Type Safety] [Version Type] Is Version type properly bounded to prevent Version::MAX + 1 wraparounds that could cause version comparison bugs throughout restore logic? (High)
